sentences.en: " Good Heavens! " and " Ouch ! " are interjections.
sentences.cn: “ 天哪! ” 和 “ 哎哟 ” 都是感叹词.

sentences.en: " Ouch! " cried the principal. " there is a thumbtack in this chair. "
sentences.cn: “ 哎哟, ” 校长叫道, “ 这把椅子上有颗图钉. ”

sentences.en: Artoo - Detoo, you know better than to trust a strange computer . Ouch!
sentences.cn: R2!你知道不该相信别人电脑小心!

sentences.en: Nelson: Ouch, my bottom. What game should we play?
sentences.cn: 呕!我的屁股! 我们要玩什么游戏 呢 ?

sentences.en: Ouch! The sand is so hot! I can burn my feet.
sentences.cn: 哎哟! 沙子这么烫! 会烫伤脚的.

sentences.en: Ouch! You trod on my toe!
sentences.cn: 哎哟！你踩着我的脚指头了！

sentences.en: Ouch. Is Jerry Buss that angry at the Kobester?
sentences.cn: 郁闷! 巴斯对科比很生气,后果很严重 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ouch. It hurts my head just thinking about it.
She was barefoot and stones dug into her feet. "Ouch, ouch," she cried.
sentences.cn: 她光着脚被石头硌到了。“哎哟，哎哟，”她大声叫着。

sentences.en: Then wrap some bandages around the cut. Then we can go. Ouch!
sentences.cn: 用绷带在伤口附近多绕几圈, 然后就可以走了.

sentences.en: To learn ; I'm not hungry, close your eyes, round, happy birthday, ouch.
sentences.cn: 我不饿, 闭上的眼睛, 转圈, 诞辰欢愉, 哎呦.

sentences.en: Watch this, Oh! Ouch! Poor Joe. stop crying, Thank you, Sarah.
sentences.cn: 看这个, 哎哟! 痛 呀 !可怜的乔,不要哭了. 谢谢你, 萨拉.

sentences.en: Zoe : Ouch , that sounds bad. What did your sister do?
sentences.cn: 哎哟, 听起来很糟糕. 你姐姐怎么做?

words.tran_cn: 哎哟（突然疼痛时发出的声音）

trans.tran_en: a sound that you make when you feel sudden pain
a brooch or clasp set with gems
